page.title: 01The village blacksmith.(1)
page.content: This is a truly contented man. He has carried on the tradition of an ancient craft lovingly for the last 25 years or so,in the{village.}He is the only Master{Blacksmith}in the county, and his services are in demand over a radius of 50 miles. 75% of his business requires him to travel. 25% comes to him at his forge. He is self-employed. He prefers the{farrier {side of his}work but still undertakes some of the traditional blacksmith jobs e.g. flower pedestals;hanging baskets;barackets;boot-scrapers;shafts on garden tools;picking safes(but only when asked by the owner!) His business is pretty constant throughout the year. In the winter he is busy because of local hunts, in the summer children's ponies take up more of his time.
